about.title: About me
about.primary: Enthusiastic web developer driven by a love for translating human problems into tech-solved solutions. From front to back end, I ensuring your online presence captivates and engages effortlessly!

projects.title: Pick-Kit
projects.description: Pick-Kit is a full stack web app to track and keep score of football wagers with other users and separate leagues. Used React.js, Chakra UI, Node.js and MySQL. Includes user authentication and persists data across devices.

projects.title: Maine Made Relief
projects.description: Create and implement designs to client specifications. Created and implemented E-commerce functionality to accept payments, handle billing, and automate shipping. Used custom css rules for adjusting layout and images for responsive design.

projects.title: Brooklin Boar Yard
projects.description: Collaborated with many parties to create desired layout and archival functionality. Designed and formatted company history and archive timeline. Designed and created brockerage page. Optimized Seacrh engine Optimization increasing monthly webtraffic by 200%.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
